query:
SELECT 
            l.id, 
            l.name,
            l.timezone,
            l.created_at,
            l.vetted,
            COUNT(
                CASE WHEN 
                    c.status = 'Closed' or c.status = 'PrincipalGiven'
                    THEN 1 END
                ) as "successful_contracts!"
        FROM lenders l
        LEFT JOIN contracts c ON c.lender_id = l.id
        WHERE l.id = $1
        GROUP BY l.name, l.id, l.vetted
